did.unittitle: Mark Starr "An Adventure in Education" Manuscript
did.abstract: "An Adventure in Education," address by Mark Starr, 1960. 8 p.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: "An Adventure in Education," address by Mark Starr on the occasion of the Testimonial Dinner in his honor at the Annual Washington's Birthday Workers' Education Conference, February 20, 1960.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mark Starr "An Adventure in Education" Manuscript #5909m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
